name: CUBE ROGUE
description:
Cube Rogue - is about what we love in senses of exploration, adventure and turn-based puzzles. 

Its mysterious world will bring to you forgotten tombs, dangerous traps, secret chamber... places where you want to seek for the right trigger to open up something.

Discover magical moments, rhythm of a living world that breath through every turn you make. Behold the greatness of ancient civilizations, strange architectures that transform itself on your action !

Be ready for surprising relics and mischievous level design unlike anything you have every solved. It's not only about steps you take, but also the order of actions you make. 

HOW TO PLAY? 
- Move the Cube through vast, mysterious worlds.
- Avoid Red Traps and other dangerous threats.
- Solve architectural puzzles by your visualization.
- Collect coins and rescue other characters !

Don't hesitate to die a lot and explore different ways every times you come back. There're always surprises for real adventurers !

Please enjoy the game and let us hear from you, to make the game ever more enjoyable !

NOTE :
Please uncheck option "Off Effect" if you have a good VGA card ! :D
